General.Name: Union Korea Pharm Co. Ltd
General.Description: Union Korea Pharm Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and production of prescription drugs in South Korea. The company offers pharmaceuticals in various formulations, including tablets, capsules, and injections in the area of cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, muscular skeletal, antibiotics, etc. The company was formerly known as Union Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Union Korea Pharm Co., Ltd. in May 2001. Union Korea Pharm Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: 417, Samwhan-HIPEX A Tower, Seongnam-si, South Korea, 13493
